sections.heading: definitions.Any term defined in the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967 and used in the Invest Nebraska Act has the same meaning in the Invest Nebraska Act unless the context requires a different meaning
sections.text: SourceLaws 2001, LB 620, ยง 4.Cross ReferencesNebraska Revenue Act of 1967, see section 77-2701.

77-5504.Additional definitions.

Any term defined in the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967 and used in the Invest Nebraska Act has the same meaning in the Invest Nebraska Act unless the context requires a different meaning.

SourceLaws 2001, LB 620, ยง 4.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Revenue Act of 1967, see section 77-2701.
